The U: S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) states that hand sanitizers with 60% alcohol can be used to help prevent contracting and spreading the coronavirus.
Public health officials emphasize that f: 3. The World Health Organization (WHO) confirms that washing hands with soap and water or using alcohol-based hand rub can kill viruses that may be on the hands.
